Payment of £250 expected for writing an article on 3 October 2016. Hours: 1.5 hrs. This fee will be donated to charity.
Payment of £250 expected for writing an article on 25 October 2016. Hours: 1.5 hrs. This fee will be donated to charity.
Payment of £250 expected for writing an article on 9 January 2017. Hours 1.5 hrs. This fee will be donated to charity.
Payment of £250 expected for writing an article on 13 January 2017. Hours 1.5 hrs. This fee will be donated to charity.

Payment of £805 for attending and speaking at a conference on Referendums and Democratic Politics in New York City on 3 and 4 November 2016. Hours: 4 hrs. The Center for European and Mediterranean Studies also paid for my flights and accommodation.
20 March 2017, payment of £400 for attending and speaking at a discussion on global political trends in London on 19 March 2017. Hours: 3 hrs.

From 20 December 2016 until further notice, consultant to LionTree LLC, 660 Madison Avenue, New York, NY 10065. For providing general analysis of European telecom, media and technology sector developments, and hosting seminars and events. From 3 May 2017, I will be paid a monthly retainer of £6,459.95 plus related expenses. Hours: approx. 32 hrs per month. I consulted ACoBA about this appointment.

From 1 January 2017 until 30 April 2017, Chairman, International eGames Committee, c/o International Group Management Limited, Stoke Park Park Road, Stoke Poges, Bucks SL2 4PG, a board established to promote international competition in e-sports. I will receive a monthly fee of £2,083 for this role, plus related expenses. Hours: approx. 8 hrs per month. I consulted ACoBA about this appointment.
Payment of £200 expected for an article written on 29 January 2017 and published the following day. Hours: approx. 1.5 hrs.
Payment of £200 expected for an article written on 15 March 2017. Hours: approx. 1.5 hrs.
31 March 2017, received £1,500 for speech to Navisite Europe Ltd, Thameside House, Hurst Road, East Molesey KT8 9AY. Hours: 6 hrs.

From 1 May 2017 until further notice, consultant to International Group Management Limited, Stoke Park Park Road, Stoke Poges, Bucks SL2 4PG, on esports and leisure. I will receive a monthly fee of £2,083 for this role, plus related expenses. Hours: approx. 8 hrs per month. I consulted ACoBA about this appointment.
